title: Gemma Arterton
summary: Gemma Christina Arterton[1] (born 2 February 1986[2]) is an English actress and film producer.[3] She made her professional stage debut playing Rosaline in Shakespeare's Love's Labour's Lost at the Globe Theatre (2007), and first professionally appeared on film in the comedy St Trinian's (2007). She played Bond Girl Strawberry Fields in the James Bond film Quantum of Solace the following year, a performance which won her an Empire Award for Best Newcomer.
